dct_description_sm: Jehoshaphat Aspin ; Hewitt, sc, Carburton Strt.
Relief shown pictorially and by shading.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Shows topography, drainage, political boundaries, islands surrounding continent.
